title: How matchmaking works (public overview)
content:
## Basics
Matchmaking pairs players with similar visible rank and recent performance bands.

title: How matchmaking works (public overview)
content:
## Queue flow
1. Join a game mode queue.
2. The system looks for close skill and region matches first.
3. If wait time grows, matching tolerance expands gradually.

title: How matchmaking works (public overview)
content:
## Notes
- Connection quality is considered to reduce laggy matches.
- Repeated declines can increase your wait time.

title: Coins/points
content:
## Coins and points
Coins are used for entry, items, and selected game actions.
Points track progression and ranking milestones.

title: Coins/points
content:
## Important
Coins and points are different systems and are not always interchangeable.

title: Connection troubleshooting on mobile
content:
## Quick checks
- Switch between Wi-Fi and mobile data.
- Restart the app.
- Disable VPN/proxy if enabled.

title: Connection troubleshooting on mobile
content:
## If issue continues
Update the app, then contact support with your device model and app version.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Account and access
Use account recovery from the login screen when sign-in fails.
Always verify phone/email/Telegram account ownership before changing profile data.
If 2FA prompts keep looping, update the app, clear cache, then retry login.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Wallets, payments, coins, and points
Coins are used for entries, boosts, and cosmetic game items.
Points are progression metrics used for ranking and season milestones.
For top-up issues, verify payment status and receipt before creating a support ticket.
For refund requests, follow the Refund Policy and provide transaction IDs.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Matchmaking and lobbies
Queue quality depends on region, active game mode, and current player population.
If queues are long, switch to a nearby region and avoid strict filters.
Cross-platform behavior can differ between Android, iOS, and Web clients.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Gameplay, rules, and fair play
Use game-specific rules for 8-ball, 9-ball, and snooker scoring/foul logic.
Report toxic behavior, collusion, or cheating through in-app reporting.
Fair-play actions are policy-driven and based on repeatable evidence.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Voice commentary and PersonaPlex
Voice commentary can run in remote PersonaPlex mode or local preview mode.
Remote mode requires PERSONAPLEX_API_URL and PERSONAPLEX_API_KEY.
If remote synthesis is unavailable, use local device/browser TTS fallback and still play commentary text.
Players can pick voice locale and style from the voice catalog when available.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Performance and connection troubleshooting
For lag/stutter: close background apps, check Wi-Fi stability, and lower graphics quality.
For disconnects: verify network permissions, VPN/proxy behavior, and device battery saver restrictions.
On Web, refresh the session and test with a modern browser version.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Reporting bugs and giving feedback
Provide reproducible steps, expected result, actual result, platform, and app version.
Attach screenshots/video for UI or gameplay issues.
Tag whether the issue impacts commentary audio, gameplay mechanics, or account features.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Tournaments and ranked play
Tournament eligibility can depend on region, level, and fair-play standing.
Tie-break logic and bracket progression follow event-specific rules.
Claim rewards from the event panel after bracket completion.

title: TonPlaygram help center complete guide
content:
## Privacy, security, and limits
The help assistant uses only public documentation and cannot expose internal secrets.
Sensitive, abusive, or exfiltration requests are blocked by safety filters.
Rate limits apply to protect reliability for all players.

title: Reporting a player
content:
## How to report
1. Open match history or player profile.
2. Tap Report.
3. Choose the reason and submit.

title: Reporting a player
content:
## What happens next
Reports are reviewed under the public Fair Play policy.

title: 8-ball rules
content:
## Objective
Pocket all balls from your assigned group (solids or stripes), then legally pocket the 8-ball.

title: 8-ball rules
content:
## Turn basics
- You continue shooting after a legal pocket.
- A foul usually passes turn to the opponent.

title: 8-ball rules
content:
## Common fouls
- No ball is hit first.
- Cue ball scratched (pocketed).
- 8-ball pocketed early.

title: 9-ball rules
content:
## Objective
Legally pocket the 9-ball. Shots must contact the lowest numbered ball first.

title: 9-ball rules
content:
## Legal shot
Hit the lowest-numbered ball first; then either pocket a ball or drive any ball to a rail.

title: 9-ball rules
content:
## Fouls
- Failing to hit the lowest-numbered ball first.
- Cue ball scratch.

title: Snooker fouls and scoring
content:
## Scoring
- Reds are worth 1 point each.
- Colors range from 2 to 7 points.

title: Snooker fouls and scoring
content:
## Foul values
Most fouls award at least 4 points to the opponent, or the value of the ball involved if higher.

title: Snooker fouls and scoring
content:
## Typical fouls
- Hitting the wrong ball first.
- Potting the cue ball.
- No ball contacting a cushion after impact when required.

title: Fair play policy (public)
content:
## Principles
Cheating, collusion, account sharing, and harassment are not allowed.

title: Fair play policy (public)
content:
## Enforcement
Actions may include warnings, temporary restrictions, or account suspension based on policy.

title: Refund policy (public)
content:
## Eligibility
Refund decisions follow platform policy and payment provider rules.

title: Refund policy (public)
content:
## How to request
Submit a support request with receipt details and the transaction date.
